amendment.description: Amendment requires the Small Business Administration to conduct a study into the causes of small business bankruptcy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 as printed in House Report 105-573 to require the Executive Office of U.S. Trustees and Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts to conduct a study of small business bankruptcies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
